description: This Python source file contains asynchronous functions for managing automation rules in a backend API, including listing existing rules and creating new ones, interfacing with a database via SQLAlchemy ORM.

methods.name: List[AutomationRule] list_automation_rules(session: AsyncSession)
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves and returns all automation rules ordered by creation time descending.

methods.name: AutomationRule create_automation_rule( session: AsyncSession, *, organization_id: str, name: str, rule_type: str, is_enabled: bool = True, match_criteria: dict | None = None, action_type: str | None = None, cron_schedule: str | None = None, )
methods.description: Asynchronously creates a new automation rule, adds it to the session, flushes to obtain its primary key, and returns the created rule.

ctags.name: create_automation_rule
ctags.signature: ( session: AsyncSession, *, organization_id: str, name: str, rule_type: str, is_enabled: bool = True, match_criteria: dict | None = None, action_type: str | None = None, cron_schedule: str | None = None, )
